Name: Seleucids
History: The Macedonian-Greek dynasty that ruled most of Alexander's former empire.

Factions.Name: Seleucids
Factions.Description: The Macedonian-Greek dynasty that ruled the Eastern part of Alexander's former empire.

Technologies.Name: Infantry Reform
Technologies.History: Seleucid and indeed Successor warfare evolved over the course of the 3rd and 2nd centuries. War with the Romans from the West and invasions from the Galatians forced the Seleucids to reform some of their infantry regiments to be more flexible.

Technologies.Name: Seleucid Cataphracts
Technologies.History: Antiochus III reformed his heavy cavalry adding extensive armor, impressed by eastern cataphracts during his campaigns to reclaim the northeast satrapies.
Technologies.Description: Champion and Heavy Cavalry +3 hack, +2 pierce armor, -15% speed.

Technologies.Name: Agema Thorakites
Technologies.History: Agema was the name of various royal guard units in hellenistic armies.
Technologies.Description: Thorakites +10% attack, hit points and vision.

Technologies.Name: Silk Route
Technologies.Description: Traders and Merchantmen -40% resource cost and train time.

Technologies.Name: Cleruchy
Technologies.History: The Seleucids attracted a large number of Greek, Macedonian, Thracian and other settlers, who were granted land around newly founded cities in return for military service.
Technologies.Description: All soldiers -10% resource cost and train time.

CivBonuses.Name: Mesopotamia
CivBonuses.History: For almost two hundred years the Seleucids controlled the fertile region between the rivers Tigres and Ephrates.
CivBonuses.Description: Farms -20% wood cost and build time.

CivBonuses.Name: Heavy Mounts
CivBonuses.History: The Seleucids had access to heavy Nisean Horses and huge Indian Elephants.
CivBonuses.Description: Bloodlines free (Cavalry and Elephants +25% hit points).

TeamBonuses.Name: Great City Founders
TeamBonuses.History: Even more so than other Successors, the Seleucids founded a huge number of cities, more often than not named Antiochia or Seleucia.
TeamBonuses.Description: Civic Centers -15% resource cost and build time (currently not shared).
